meanings.definition: A division of a county, typically smaller than a county but larger than a municipality.
meanings.sent1: In some areas, subcounties have their own local government.
meanings.sent2: The subcounties in this region play a crucial role in managing public services.
meanings.sent3: The subcounties decided to have a friendly competition on who could plant the most trees.
meanings.sent4: The subcounties stood out like colorful puzzle pieces on the map.
meanings.sent5: Children in the school learned about the different subcounties in their county through a fun game.

meanings.definition: The administrative units within a county.
meanings.sent1: Residents can access various services at the subcounties within their county.
meanings.sent2: Each subcounty has its own unique characteristics and needs.
meanings.sent3: The subcounties organized a picnic to foster better communication among officials.
meanings.sent4: The subcounties functioned like gears in a well-oiled machine, ensuring smooth operations.
meanings.sent5: Tourists were amazed by the beauty and diversity of the subcounties they visited.
